website_summaries.verdict: The latest Gear VR adds compatibility with Samsung's latest phones and cements its position as the best mobile VR product right now.
pros: Great audio-visual quality for a phone-based VR accessory
A growing library of apps and games
This model is more comfortable than earlier versions, and you can charge the phone while using it
cons: Only works with a specific collection of Samsung phones
Oculus PC game and app library isn't cross-compatible with Android or Google Cardboard VR ecosystems
Lacks the positional awareness of PC-based VR rigs
Limited inputs mean it's less immersive VR than you can get with larger, more-expensive PC-connected systems like the Rift

customer_reviews.title: Great intro to VR - within limits.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a decent taste of VR. There is really no way at this price point to compete vs a full-blown system. Using my S6 (and an additional cooling fan) it works without issue. Without getting into software limitations it works pretty well. A bit of light leakage is the only physical gripe. Hardware wise, the cooling fan thing is annoying but an easy fix. Overall I'm pretty satisfied given the price and limitations.
customer_reviews.author: P. Young

customer_reviews.title: Missing part..
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get mine only to find that it was missing the usb-C adapter. Luckily I have an s6 so I only needed the one it came with but I cant find the adapter online anywhere and if I want to upgrade my phone this would be useless to me unless I find an adapter for it. So Im afraid to upgrade because I dont want to feel as if I wasted money on buying this in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with Galaxy S8
customer_reviews.text: There were some questions as to whether this 2016 VR will work with the Galaxy S8, it will not. It does come with an adaptor for the USB 3.1 to connect to the Galaxy S8 but then the phone WILL NOT fit. This "review" does not speak to the quality of the item since I was not able to use it, I just wanted to let anyone know who thought they could save some cash and buy the older version for their S8 that it will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi McCraw

customer_reviews.title: Samsung thinks they are funny
customer_reviews.text: Product said that it shipped with a usb-c adapter, so I felt good that it would work with the new GS8+. WRONG They shipped a random usb-c adapter that is definitely not the one for the gear vr. I suppose it's for the usbc plug that's on the headset but either way I've upgraded to the GS8+ and have no way to use the gear vr now. I had to pay another 25 dollars on samsungparts.com to get the right adapter, but it may be MORE THAN A MONTH according to the website.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Glass

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly new to VR and not a guy who's going to live in a VR world. This is more of a novelty so I'm not spending hundreds of $$$ on this. One of my co-workers has an older model so I decided to get a name brand, but less expensive model. This this works great! Works great with the Galaxy S7 Edge. It took quite a long time for the initial start up apps to fully load, but once they did - it was VR heaven. I really like it, plus there is plenty of "free-ware" to make the VR enjoyable. I was very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used a generic hmd for my iPhone and it almost ruined mobile VR for me. Nothing felt right. Then I got the GearVR for a work project and it's much more robust, functional and comfortable. It can fit pretty snug and the glass looks good. I didn't have trouble adjusting the focus for my eyes at all. I used this with a Galaxy S7.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Daley

customer_reviews.title: Great intro to vr
customer_reviews.text: It's a great giant screen tv in the gym when working out. I can watch netflix and youtube but only youtube has some vr content. It does have a problem with overheating in a warm environment. The screen is a little grainy but easily overlooked. Seems to overheat faster when playing video games especially when using the separate controller
customer_reviews.author: roland ekstrand

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner VR
customer_reviews.text: Does not include the Type-C connector required to use the Galaxy S8. Fun introduction to VR. There is a lot of free games and media to use to see if you want to spend more on VR. The lack of a refund option for paid content is very disturbing though. This is understandable though, as most VR experiences are very short lived and can be fully experienced in under an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for some stuff, not for a lot other
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid, I am very impressed. One major problem though. when you put your phone in it, it auto connects to the manufacturer's site. As such, if you want to load any other program, you cannot unless you do like me, and slightly tilt the phone so it doesn't plug in when you set it in the headset's cavity. Hard to explain, but if you are fine using only the manufacturer's products, it is great. If there are other apps you may want to use, you will have problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Defective as hell
customer_reviews.text: If only this gear VR would actually work after a week I was playing at hardcore for about a week and then I took a break because of work and come back to it plug it in and it tells me that my device is not correctly Plugged In which is impossible I've done the uninstall but gear wont follow through with install again just continues to tell me my device is improperly plugged in, just a fail, so far all the forms I've ran acrossed says that the gear vr is defective
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel or getting lost in netflix!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It was inexpensive and a great entry into VR for me. It works great with my galaxy s9+ it does pinch my nose a bit, but I found that I could flip the velcro on the nose part to have it sit higher and allow me to breathe comfortably. It's not heavy, pretty comfortable overall. I use it with some bluetooth headphones and really get lost in the netflix experience. It's easy to forget where you are, which I think is the point. I use it when I travel for work, and it makes me feel right at home. Overall, I think it's great, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Layners

customer_reviews.title: One of the more comfortable headsets available
customer_reviews.text: One of the more comfortable headsets available. However, it makes it hard to breathe through my nose. It's also meant to work with the Oculus ecosystem which locks me into their environment. I can't use any app outside of that environment with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: When I'm rich I'll get something higher end, but this is great.
customer_reviews.text: Namebrand enough that it has software and tech support. Cheap enough that it just works with your phone with no big setup. Only downside is overheating, but that's your phone's fault, not its. Just don't attach the back cover.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Too bad that it only detect head tilting and you cant ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is at the forefront of VR technology. Too bad that it only detect head tilting and you cant move around but thats not what this product is about. If you have a samsung galaxy like I do you should buy this too.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Speechless
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother as a christmas gift, and now it's become a family toy! Games and movies literally come to life with this. Using Netflix puts you into a movie theatre, and playing The Conjuring in VR is extremely frightening, but totally worth the big scares. Using it is a learn curve though, as the controls for everything is where your right temple is, but if you buy the VR controller, it makes it easier to use all-around.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Loads sideways WHY
customer_reviews.text: Received no instructions figured it out was easy to use and it was fun for a few days then the apps loaded sideways changed phone to rotate that didn't work . Can't find help on line does anyone know own how to fix
customer_reviews.author: Jaime D. Corona

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! Not Compatible with Galaxy S8 Plus
customer_reviews.text: It did not include a charger or USB-adapter... I have the S8 plus and this thing is now useless.. Ill be returning
customer_reviews.author: josiah scott

customer_reviews.title: Way better quality VR than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Way better quality VR than I expected. I own the oculus and PS4VR and using a S7 the image quality was right up there with my other VR devices. I got this for media rather than for gaming, so I don't know how well it stands up in that area. But for the price I was extremely impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great for VR
customer_reviews.text: Great for VR if you have a Samsung phone and can't afford oculus. Nice and comfortable and lots of free content to explore. If you are looking to get in VR great place to start. Better than cardboard because of interactivity and buttons on side of unit.
customer_reviews.author: Earl F S

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It works well, it's just not worth buying. Your phone will overheat and lose battery power very quickly. There also aren't very many real games to play with this. It's a novelty item, so once you've played with a little, you'll lose interest.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I have used it a few times myself and I think it is awesome. I also got him the SteelSeries Stratus XL ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his birthday. He loves it. I have used it a few times myself and I think it is awesome. I also got him the SteelSeries Stratus XL Bluetooth Wireless Gaming Controller and a hard travel storage case to put it all in. His headphones fit in there also. It's a great carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Leah DeBrooke

customer_reviews.title: Not for New Galaxy users
customer_reviews.text: It's great if you have the phone that they say have. But, if you're an s8+ user like myself look the other direction. To compensate the newer generations it come with a crappy adapter that doesn't even work. The phone won't even fit. The real Samsung Gear VR actually came with an adapter to compensate new models of the galaxy. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Gaines

customer_reviews.title: KEWL
customer_reviews.text: This little gem is packed with fun for a low price. I have an S7, and it works great. I'd recommend getting the controller. Makes the experience more fun and lifelike. It's made fairly well for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy it
customer_reviews.text: This thing made my phone so hot you couldn't play for more than 15mins... Really tough to get into a game when you have to stop that frequently.
customer_reviews.author: William F.

customer_reviews.title: The future is AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING!! I just watched Jumanji in 3d on the moon! My Samsung s9 plus fits! Don't know why people can't figure out how to put their phone in this
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Bruhn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This product came quickly, however, it is advertised on the outside of the box, and mine was left on my doorstep for the world to see for over five hours, in below freezing weather. I do think that that is a complaint for the mail delivery service, though. This thing is so cool! I gave this to my husband for Christmas and he took it to all of our holiday parties to share! It connects to his Samsung Galaxy S7 easily.
customer_reviews.author: Page Fish

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter for Christmas and it's her favorite gift. I watch a few videos on it and the 3-D and motion was really good. One was a roller coaster ride; I had to sit down for it so as not to fall over. A lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: CathyL

customer_reviews.title: my daughter loves it, as her first vr
customer_reviews.text: Well i needed something to review before purchasing the one that you can download stuff to without using your cell phone .My daughter loves it, and it's very neat, so i think that was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: ESTHER FREDERIC

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with my grandson's Samsung phone, which I was not aware of when I purchased it. But I understand that there is a patch that might work.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth LaMarr

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, Fogs up a little on the inside but not too bad. Cant beat it for the price but I would have rather saved my money and put it towards buying the htc vive
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Cool VR experience
customer_reviews.text: Did not have instructions included when it arrived but a menu showed what to do as soon as I put the phone on it. Demos in the first screen are very useful in showing you how to maneuver the mouse and use buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Nonomex

customer_reviews.title: Facebook ruined a great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product when I first got it. Then facebook got involved and totally f____cked this product up. I would pay 10x the amount for one just like it without facebook getting their noses involved.
customer_reviews.author: mike in kansas

customer_reviews.title: not practical of fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Needs to hook up to my Samsung Phone, but after 30 minutes the phone gets so hot and a notice of phone over heating pops up on screen. so what good is it.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC H GINNEGAR

customer_reviews.title: Can't breathe
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if Samsung did any ergonomic testing, but if I position this set so I'm looking thru the center of the lens, my nose is pinched off so I cant breathe. I choose life, so these go back
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: Not for Note 4
customer_reviews.text: It does not fit the Note 4 because of the charging port. Do not buy if you have the Note 4. I read several reviews that said it would fit but it does not. Shipping and everything else was great!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: USB 3, mini, or whatever, NOT USB ...
customer_reviews.text: USB 3, mini, or whatever, NOT USB TYPE C. the "adapter" is for the outside of the device for a power chord. Not a usb c phone.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great product; Works with S8
customer_reviews.text: Super fun, mine did come with a USB-C converter already installed in the headset. Would highly recommend spending the extra ~$17 for the controller. Enjoyable and arrived exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Vr using phones just isn't very good ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Vr using phones just isn't very good yet. Has a "screen door" effect which takes away from the experience. Phones also overheat quickly so not much good for more than about 20-30 min. The headset is good though with the screen door effect as my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sending back.
customer_reviews.text: I've never gotten motion sickness until I used this. Used it for maybe 5 minutes to set it up and now i wanna vomit. Sending it back. Also, it's a pain to use if you don't have the controller. Last, it forces facebook on you. That was the last straw.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: I haven't gotten to use the VR bc it did ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gotten to use the VR bc it did not come with the C-adapter for the s8 as described. And they are nearly impossible to find online. The one star is bc without the adapter I am unable to use the headset. I'm hoping for a resolution before just having to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need Adapter for Galaxy S8
customer_reviews.text: If you are getting this for a Galaxy S8 generation phone, you will need to purchase an adapter from Samsung Parts to fit the power port. The screen is a little pixelated once you plug everything in but seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: mk622

customer_reviews.title: It's ok just to try.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't charge my phone, even when I connect the USB cable. It also said too quickly that device needs to cold down. Over all I think it's ok just for testing some apps and to try VR by the first time only. Next time I would buy a better and autonomous one.
customer_reviews.author: Anyelo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: This will make your phone heat up a lot, take up a lot of memory, and generally be an imperfect experience. Samsung really limited your options during its use. I'm glad I got this for $30, instead of the $100 they want for new models.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works with S8 perfectly. Trust me
customer_reviews.text: Literally amazing! 100% works with S8 so I have no idea what people are talking about a missing piece or wrong port. So worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Trusted Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great (removed orig review of - Doesn't work. Spent hours trying to reinstall software on ...)
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Spent hours trying to reinstall software on Edge 7. Keep getting "Oculus Home has closed unexpectedly. Disappointing. I should send this back but I'm hoping Oculus support gets back to me. UPDATE: had my phone (Edge 7) replaced under warranty (specifically because of this issue) and the new phone worked just fine with the Gear VR! Was surprised how good the tracking was as I moved around! Giving it 4 Stars (didn't give 5 because Samsung made this issue very difficult to diagnose, even their help site personnel didn't figure it out).
customer_reviews.author: W. Infante

customer_reviews.title: She loved it and her reaction was priceless
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise Christmas present for my wife. She loved it and her reaction was priceless. It's neat to watch her when she's using it. The commercials don't do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing a small important piece
customer_reviews.text: Missing a couple tiny pieces so itndoesnt work with my samsung 8 like it was suppose to. Dont sell it mildly cheaper saying the box was just a little scuffed if its actually missibg pieces. Bad form.
customer_reviews.author: SLB123

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our nephew loved these, Christmas day was very comical passing them around watching everyone ride the coaster!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with USB-C phones unless you purchase expensive additional adapter.
customer_reviews.text: First one did not come with USB-C adapter. Returned it. Second one also no adapter! Unable to use with USB-c phone.
customer_reviews.author: the revJ

customer_reviews.title: Kid friendly and great price. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is holding up well to kid use. Great picture. It's been dropped once a day since I bought it and we have no problems with it. Nice padding and head strap is good material. Very happy with the product and price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Novel
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a novelty. Only used mine about 10 times, now it just sits in a box.
customer_reviews.author: N. Collar

customer_reviews.title: Not for use with S10 plus
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with samsung S10 plus. Doesn't fit once you put the usb c adapter in it. It is comfortable but I can't use it....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toy. Inexpensive entertainment. Looks of free vr stuff avail online, works really well.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL MCDUELL

customer_reviews.title: It did not come with the USB-c adapter which is included in the list of items in the box.
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with the USB-c adapter as written on the product page in the list of items contained in the box. This should be queried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas present and they love it! Works like it should!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good Intro to VR
customer_reviews.text: I have an HTC Vive but wanted to show people how VR is in its basic form. This works great with my S6 Edge+. There is a little light bleed from the back because it doesnt hug your face as tight but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome VR experience!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome! VR is new to me and I love it! The best gaming I have ever experienced and most games feels like you are really there!!!
customer_reviews.author: James E Bartley

customer_reviews.title: Cool new tech.
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to try VR. This was a good cheap way to start! Did make me dizzy a few times but I learned what things to avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! This gadget is fun, works well, and is sturdy. I was really impressed with the quality and how easy it was to operate it. I would buy it again and recommend it for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer dyer

customer_reviews.title: giddyness. not-smooth experience
customer_reviews.text: again, Mr. Samsung pl contact I can give some serious advice...
customer_reviews.author: Rajeev Prasad

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't  include a usb-c adapter
customer_reviews.text: Although it is written that it contains usb-c adapter for the gear vr,it came without it.now i have to purchase that adapter from another source.without these you can't use it with smartphone containing usb -c(galaxy late models).
customer_reviews.author: Tamir Salomon

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Freaking amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Freaking amazing!!! Just cannot be described!!! Awesome flawless and works perfectly with my Galaxy S7. The free games are seriously sensational!
customer_reviews.author: Cascade25

customer_reviews.title: HOURS OF GOOD FUN FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY !!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT.... MY OLDER ADULT KIDS AND OLDER GRANDKIDS LOVE THIS ITEM IT HAS BEEN SO ENTERTAINING FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY !!!
customer_reviews.author: rita swaim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Realism!
customer_reviews.text: Samsung just needs to figure out how to keep the phone from overheating so soon.. Average run time is 15-20 minutes and then phone needs to chill for another 20 minutes or so. However the experience is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Lane DesGeorges

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for now
customer_reviews.text: Best part of this whole setup is the netflix theater included in the Samsung software which only works with the headset. Great added feature that sets it apart from other headsets is the touch pad and volume controls. Works very well but I do not like the fit of the phones in the headset. I will not sit properly with any case on.
customer_reviews.author: Monil Singh

customer_reviews.title: Overrated
customer_reviews.text: I think these are overrated. They are just okay. You have to pay for a lot of apps.
customer_reviews.author: La Darden

customer_reviews.title: Fun but has a ways to go still
customer_reviews.text: Really fun product, and works very well. Sits weird on nose however, and may cause headaches. Not easy to clean either, but overall pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: MJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Charge port is usb c...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome device but I don't understand having the charging port usb c and not micro usb when it only works (at least this one) with micro usb galaxys... seems odd so 4 stars. I recommend getting the latest version if this is a problem for you as it was for me.
customer_reviews.author: Steven N

customer_reviews.title: Way better than other cheap products but comfort could be improved ...
customer_reviews.text: It's well made but can get hot fast. Way better than other cheap products but comfort could be improved same as ventilation
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Very cool, I've enjoyed it and so have the kids
customer_reviews.text: Very cool, I've enjoyed it and so have the kids. Nothing like watching my grandson move like he's on a roller coaster! It was hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Got is for my son-in-law for Christmas. This is amazing. The whole family loves using it.
customer_reviews.author: PattyPoo

customer_reviews.title: Missing Internal Type-C
customer_reviews.text: Product description indicates that it includes a type C adapter but only a microUSB to type C converter was included, which does not allow me to use my S8 with it. Had to order the part separately for $20.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: it looks and feels amazing to be have these on
customer_reviews.author: RyleeTop Contributor: Mountain Biking

customer_reviews.title: Such a great VR headset
customer_reviews.text: Such a great VR headset. If you have a compatible Galaxy phone, I strongly suggest getting one of these.
customer_reviews.author: A.Bren

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 100 dollars but it's a pretty neat gadget to have around
customer_reviews.text: Not worth 100 dollars but it's a pretty neat gadget to have around. I found I quickly got bored with it except for watching netflix in bed. And it sounds like google's VR experience promises to be much better when it comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Recommend It
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting a lot more. The VR is cool, there just not much out there to do with it. And the S7 gets super hot after about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Luan N.

customer_reviews.title: Works great with a few different types of phones
customer_reviews.text: Works great with a few different types of phones. I use it will my S7 Edge. Make sure you lock the adapter in place or your phone will fly out.
customer_reviews.author: Doug H.

customer_reviews.title: Surprise gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift that surprised my daughter. She had said she saw it on TV and never expected to receive one. I think it was the best gift for her this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Donia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with purchase. Was exactly as described an saved a butload of cash.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Avila

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit 'n Fun
customer_reviews.text: So much fun to use! It fits my phone perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Two Rivers Trading

customer_reviews.title: Page says that it comes with the USB adapter, ...
customer_reviews.text: Page says that it comes with the USB adapter, but it is not the phone adapter. Older boxes came with a swappable brick to use a USB C phone, but it was not included in the newer packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Bioshock

customer_reviews.title: Gotta try them out
customer_reviews.text: If you're into VR or want to get into VR, this is the one. It works as intended. Sometimes the lens inside the eyes fog up, but that's expected from covering your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Allan W Wong

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: This gear VR is so awesome, Samsung couldn't have created anything better. This is for the 7s and below. It was well worth the money. I can't wait till they come out with a 3d model.
customer_reviews.author: Timm Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to the future!! These are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: So we did return these (only because my cell phone case is nearly impossible to take off, which you must do to use these) BUT, the product itself is amazing! You truly will get sucked into what is a truly amazing and immersive 3d experience. These are extremely comfortable to wear and even my 3 1/2 year old was able to wear them and enjoy them. Highly recommend and the price is great for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Some people may think you can use the samsungs galaxy 8+ but its false only the 2017 version is equipped with the necessary port i had bought this then the part directly from samsung and it works fine but isnt as clear as my friends VR ocolus rift
customer_reviews.author: Tim childs

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only able to use for about 20 minutes at a time and then my galaxy 7 overheats.
customer_reviews.author: tobin

customer_reviews.title: ... cheap VR setups using Cardboard and cheaper headsets but hated it. Glad I didn't give up on VR ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried other cheap VR setups using Cardboard and cheaper headsets but hated it. Glad I didn't give up on VR before trying this products. 6 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: trader joe

customer_reviews.title: Fun and fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Even though I'm not a gamer I truly enjoyed this with the visual aspects of the VR. Also works really good with flying a drone with Litchi app.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dengler

customer_reviews.title: Works well. I wish I could say the same ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I wish I could say the same about the samsung galaxy S7. It overheats constantly when doing VR.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Deucher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful I love it all used it a lot play that lol!
customer_reviews.author: Bennie Houston

customer_reviews.title: got this for the wife, and well, she ...
customer_reviews.text: got this for the wife, and well, she will not let me even come close to using it, she is "in game" on her head all the time
customer_reviews.author: wb

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent
customer_reviews.text: This is the one to have. If you own a Samsung phone, don't bother with the other brands out there. This is everything the commercial say.....Magnificent!
customer_reviews.author: Thumper

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Gear VR
customer_reviews.text: Best price around and does what it's suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: BigE

customer_reviews.title: I was extremely excited to get this product but now I'm Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the controller bundle of this item and the product did not arrive with a controller or a USB C adapter and it also didn't work. I was extremely excited to get this product but now I'm Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: G. Schouten

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great view lots of games and excitement
customer_reviews.text: Great product with great view lots of games and excitement
customer_reviews.author: LaTonya

customer_reviews.title: It is great, but just remember to buy the usb type ...
customer_reviews.text: It is great, but just remember to buy the usb type c adapter if you plan on using the galaxy s8 with this. Otherwise it's mind blowing
customer_reviews.author: uzair

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointinf
customer_reviews.text: This was my son's birthday present and I have been trying to get the phone which is a Samsung S7 Galaxy to click into it for over an hour and it just won't give disappointing
customer_reviews.author: heidijo maynard

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I mean REALLY, WOW. And I've barely gone beyond the lounge home screen. Try to reign in your emotions. Remember...it's only a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Shifrin

customer_reviews.title: Its really fun and my son love the VR headset
customer_reviews.text: Got some problems with the order, but got sorted out really fast, Its really fun and my son love the VR headset.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Must get!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this VR headset! Just ordered the controller and protective case for it as well. Only thing that is annoying is when dust gets on the lens. Have not had any problems with my phone overheating. Other than that, I highly recommend getting this if you have a compatible Samsung Galaxy phone.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Truty

product_meta.title: Samsung Gear VR (2016) - GS7s, Note 5, GS6s (US Version w/ Warranty - Discontinued by Manufacturer by Manufacturer)
feature_bullets: Turn your compatible Samsung Galaxy smartphone into a completely portable and wireless virtual reality machine.
Easy to use touch pad with dedicated Back and Home buttons
Wide field of view, precise head-tracking and low latency brings reality to the virtual, Be transported to amazing new worlds, in games, video and images, Thousands of 360 degree panoramic photos
Compatible with: Samsung Galaxy S7, Galaxy S7 edge, Galaxy Note5, Galaxy S6 edge+, Galaxy S6 and Galaxy S6 edge
